title: Canonical Verification of Continuous Crypto Learning on CEO Dashboard

root_cause_analysis.symptom: Dashboard showed Born Today = 0, Killed Today = 0 despite 2 hypotheses created
root_cause_analysis.root_cause: v_lvg_daily_status view queried learning_velocity_metrics (derived table) instead of hypothesis_canon (canonical source)

changes: Replaced v_lvg_daily_status to query hypothesis_canon directly
Born Today = COUNT(*) FROM hypothesis_canon WHERE created_at::date = CURRENT_DATE
Killed Today = COUNT(*) WHERE status = 'FALSIFIED' AND falsified_at::date = CURRENT_DATE
Created v_lvg_reconciliation view for continuous verification

verification_queries.canonical_count: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fhq_learning.hypothesis_canon WHERE created_at::date = CURRENT_DATE

objective_b_explicit_crypto_inclusion.proof: Query includes all asset classes, no market open/closed gates

ceo_status_sentence: Crypto learning is ACTIVE. 2 hypotheses generated today from finn_crypto_scheduler. 0% death rate indicates new hypotheses awaiting Tier-1 evaluation, not inactivity.
